Hanani Bathina

I am 2nd year Masters Student in Data Science at Chennai Mathematical Institute

  1. I have interned over the Summers(2025) at Tata Communications, where I worked on developing a Natural, Expressive TTS for Indian-Accented English
  2. Before that, I was a research intern at AI4Bharat, where my main contribution was a ACL Paper - Can Vision-Language Models evaluate Handwritten Math?

I am primarily motivated by utilising AI for the purpose of increasing average worker productivity. To that end, I've been working on a project that utilizes Indic-ASR Models for helping doctors scribe patient conversations (It is Revenue-Generating. Real Customers, Real Doctors, Real Hospitals).

Avid Motorcyclist. Certified Mountaineer (HMI). Up for any sport (Except Basketball & Tennis). Can (Almost) Make Anything
